title: Blockchain Seed diligence checklist
summary: Projected diligence checklist for Blockchain founders raising a Seed round. Includes a checklist and rationale aligned to investor diligence.

items.item: Current cap table and option pool plan
items.rationale: Investors validate ownership, dilution, and incentives.
Proves commercial momentum and a clear path to revenue.
Shows the path to de-risk the core technical thesis.
Critical for regulated or enterprise-heavy markets.
Mitigates protocol risk and regulatory exposure.
Signals you can close a Seed round in Blockchain.
